version_description:
Thanks for using bWallet! With this update we've included the function to add check number for a transaction, also we've included dark mode to help us serve you better.
We're glad to hear your feedback. If you have any problems or suggestions please feel free to send us a mail.

Thanks for using bWallet! This is a tiny update that we've fixed a few minor bugs to help us serve you better.
We're glad to hear your feedback. If you have any problems or suggestions please feel free to send us a mail.

- Added Face ID and Touch ID protection
- Improved the readability of exported PDF files
- Fixed the crash when adding split categories
- You can swipe the transaction list left and right to view transactions on different dates
- Choose and search category directly on New Transaction page
- Other minor bug fixes
- Stability improved

===V1.2.1===
- Fixed a minor bug

===V1.2===
- Added Face ID and Touch ID protection
- Improved the readability of exported PDF files
- Fixed the crash when adding split categories
- You can swipe the transaction list left and right to view transactions on different dates
- Choose and search category directly on New Transaction page
- Other minor bug fixes
- Stability improved

- Choose and search categories directly on New Budget & Bill page.
- Minor bug fixes.
- Stability improved.
